levels.title: Meet the Model
levels.description: Welcome to Foundry Local! In this level, you'll learn how to call a local Small Language Model (SLM) and get your first AI response.
levels.objective: Call a local SLM using the Foundry Local SDK and print the response.
instructions: The game will connect to your local Foundry model
You'll send a simple greeting prompt to the model
Read and understand the AI's response
Complete the task to earn your first badge!

task.prompt: Hello! Please introduce yourself and explain what you can help me with.
task.successCriteria: Receive a valid response from the model

hints: Make sure Foundry Local is running on your machine
The SDK handles the connection automatically
Don't worry if the response takes a moment - that's normal!

reward.description: You made your first AI call!

levels.title: Prompt Mastery
levels.description: Great job! Now let's learn how to write better prompts. The quality of your prompt directly affects the quality of the AI's response.
levels.objective: Refine a poorly written prompt and compare the outputs to see the improvement.
instructions: You'll be given a 'bad' prompt that's vague and unclear
Your task is to improve it using prompt engineering techniques
Compare the responses from both prompts
Learn what makes a prompt effective!

improvementTips: Be specific about what you want to learn
Provide context about your skill level
Ask for examples or step-by-step explanations
task.successCriteria: Create an improved prompt that generates a more helpful response

hints: Think about the 5 W's: Who, What, When, Where, Why
Try adding 'for a beginner' or 'with examples'

reward.description: You mastered the art of prompt crafting!

levels.title: Embeddings Explorer
levels.description: Embeddings are numerical representations of text that capture meaning. Let's explore how to use them for semantic search!
levels.objective: Generate embeddings and search a knowledge base to find the most relevant information.
instructions: Learn what embeddings are and why they're useful
Generate an embedding for your search query
Search through a small knowledge base
Find the closest semantic match to your query

knowledgeBase.text: Foundry Local allows you to run AI models directly on your computer without needing an internet connection.
Prompt engineering is the practice of designing and refining inputs to get better outputs from AI models.
Embeddings convert text into numbers that computers can use to understand meaning and find similar content.
Workflows in Foundry let you chain multiple AI operations together to create powerful pipelines.
The Foundry CLI provides command-line tools for managing models, running inferences, and debugging.

sampleQueries: How do I use AI without internet?
What are numerical representations of text?
How do I make my prompts better?
task.successCriteria: Successfully find the most relevant knowledge base entry for a query

hints: Embeddings capture semantic meaning, not just keywords
Similar concepts will have similar embedding vectors
Cosine similarity measures how close two embeddings are

reward.description: You discovered the power of semantic search!

levels.title: Workflow Wizard
levels.description: Time to level up! Workflows let you chain multiple AI operations together. Let's build your first pipeline!
levels.objective: Create and run a multi-step Foundry workflow that processes text through multiple stages.
instructions: Understand what a workflow is and why it's useful
Design a simple 3-step pipeline
Execute each step and pass results to the next
See how workflows automate complex tasks

workflowSteps.name: Summarize
workflowSteps.description: Take a long text and create a brief summary

workflowSteps.name: Extract Keywords
workflowSteps.description: Identify the main keywords from the summary

workflowSteps.name: Generate Questions
workflowSteps.description: Create study questions based on the keywords

task.sampleInput: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is transforming how we work and live. Machine learning, a subset of AI, enables computers to learn from data without being explicitly programmed. Deep learning uses neural networks with many layers to process complex patterns. Natural Language Processing (NLP) helps computers understand human language. These technologies power everything from virtual assistants to medical diagnosis systems.
task.successCriteria: Successfully run all three workflow steps and produce final output

hints: Each step's output becomes the next step's input
Workflows save time by automating repetitive tasks
You can modify and extend workflows as needed

reward.description: You created your first AI pipeline!

levels.title: Build Your Own Tool
levels.description: The final challenge! Create a custom JavaScript function and integrate it as a tool that an AI agent can use.
levels.objective: Build a custom tool function and register it with a Foundry Local agent.
instructions: Learn about AI agents and tool calling
Create a JavaScript function that performs a useful task
Register your function as a tool the AI can use
Watch the AI call your custom tool!

toolExamples.name: calculate_tip
toolExamples.description: Calculate a tip amount based on bill total and percentage

toolExamples.name: format_date
toolExamples.description: Convert a date string to a friendly format

toolExamples.name: word_count
toolExamples.description: Count words in a text string

task.successCriteria: Create and register a custom tool that the AI successfully calls

hints: Tools give AI agents real capabilities
Keep your function simple and well-documented
The AI needs clear descriptions to know when to use tools

reward.description: You've mastered Foundry Local! You're now a Foundry Champion!
